amendment.description: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 118-12 to add a private right of action for parents to hold schools accountable for not honoring the rights set forth in Title I and Title II of this bill.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to add a private right of action for parents to hold schools accountable for not honoring the rights set forth in Title I and Title II.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Crane amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 61 - 365 (Roll no. 151).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Crane.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Crane amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 61 - 365 (Roll no. 151).
